comment.author: 43854658@N00
comment._content: Is the above listed URL the correct one for "more detailed information about this photograph"?

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Hi PW, Yes the URL takes you to the catalogue record for a collection of photographs which includes this one. The record gives you information about the collection. To see all the photographs in the collection which have been digitised, just click on the image in the record and the album will open.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Dear Ian McKay If you follow the link below, you can see Sam Hood's trusty Graflex camera in the type of cute photograph he often sold to the press. acms.sl.nsw.gov.au/item/itemDetailPaged.aspx?itemID=9524 Of course this begs the question "what camera did Sam Hood use to phtotograph the boys?"
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
